statements.update: update ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG set NILAI=(#Nilai#/#Jumlah#), GENERATED='1' where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and NOBA=#Noba# and MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# and URUTBRG=#Urutbrg#

update ASET_ATRIBUSIDET set NILAI = (select ISNULL(SUM(A.NILAI),0) from ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG A where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey#) WHERE UNITKEY=#Unitkey# AND NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# AND NOBA=#Noba# AND MTGKEY=#Mtgkey#
update ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, A.NOATRIBUSI, A.NOBA, A.MTGKEY, A.IDBRG, A.URUTBRG, A.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET , AB.JUMLAH, AB.NILAI AS NILAIBA, A.NILAI, A.GENERATED, LTRIM(RTRIM(D.KDASET))+' - '+LTRIM(RTRIM(D.NMASET)) AS KDNMASET from ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG A left join ASET_BERITADETBRG AB on AB.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY and AB.NOBA = A.NOBA and AB.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY and AB.URUTBRG = A.URUTBRG left join DAFTASET D ON D.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey#

select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, A.NOATRIBUSI, A.NOBA, A.MTGKEY, A.IDBRG, A.URUTBRG, A.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET, AA.TAHUN, AA.NOREG, A.NILAI, A.GENERATED from ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG A left join ASET_KIB AA ON AA.IDBRG = A.IDBRG left join DAFTASET D ON D.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# and A.URUTBRG=#Urutbrg#

select row_number () over (order by A.URUTBRG) ID, A.UNITKEY, A.NOATRIBUSI, A.NOBA, A.MTGKEY, A.URUTBRG, A.ASETKEY , D.KDASET, D.NMASET, LTRIM(RTRIM(D.KDASET))+' - '+LTRIM(RTRIM(D.NMASET)) AS KDNMASET, AB.JUMLAH, AB.NILAI AS NILAIBA , sum(A.NILAI) NILAI, A.GENERATED, #Blokid# BLOKID from ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG A left join ASET_BERITADETBRG AB on AB.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY and AB.NOBA = A.NOBA and AB.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY and AB.URUTBRG = A.URUTBRG left join DAFTASET D ON D.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# group by A.UNITKEY, A.NOATRIBUSI, A.NOBA, A.MTGKEY, A.URUTBRG, A.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET, AB.JUMLAH, AB.NILAI, A.NILAI, A.GENERATED

select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, A.NOATRIBUSI, A.NOBA, A.MTGKEY, A.IDBRG, A.ASETKEY, D.KDASET, D.NMASET, A.URUTBRG , 1 JUMLAH, X.NILAIRENOV AS NILAIBA, A.NILAI, A.GENERATED, LTRIM(RTRIM(D.KDASET))+' - '+LTRIM(RTRIM(D.NMASET)) AS KDNMASET from ASET_ATRIBUSIDETBRG A left join ( select A.UNITKEY, A.NOBARENOV, A.ASETKEY, A.NILAIRENOV, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (order by A.UNITKEY, A.IDBRG, A.ASETKEY) URUTBRG from ASET_HISTRENOVDET A WHERE A.NOBARENOV = #Noba# ) X ON X.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY AND X.NOBARENOV = A.NOBA AND X.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY AND X.URUTBRG = A.URUTBRG left join DAFTASET D ON D.ASETKEY = A.ASETKEY where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey#
where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NOATRIBUSI=#Noatribusi# and A.NOBA=#Noba# and A.MTGKEY=#Mtgkey# and A.IDBRG=#Idbrg# and A.URUTBRG=#Urutbrg#
